reBOOT LAN Party

DEC 7 - 8, 2019, Indianapolis, IN
Scroll For Details

Register!

Revive The Indianapolis LAN Scene

After successful events in 2018 and summer 2019, we're having an exclusive winter event this December. Spots are limited, so grab a ticket and come get to know the staff and attendees at a smaller exclusive event. Join us for a winter celebration of PC gaming as we bring the Indianapolis LAN scene back to its roots. Bring your friends to see old faces and new while gaming on a state of the art network, together!

Not sure what a LAN party is? It's an excuse for gamers of all types to gather in one place and meet each other, hang out, and game together for 24 hours in an awesome atmosphere. There are side events like tournaments and raffles, but the main event is gaming with others! Consoles of all types and PCs are welcome! If you have any questions at all feel free to ask on Our Discord.

The 2019 venue is TBA, but will be in Indianapolis like our previous venues. Click here for photo album of last event. Presented by reBOOT LAN in association with StompFest, IndyGamers, & Challonge. Cash in-person will not be accepted. If you wish to attend, purchase tickets in advance via the register link.

Event Details

  • $35 Admission
  • Max Seating - 60
  • Free WIFI
  • Prizes - Free Tickets To Winners
  • Food & Drink- Allowed
  • 10gbE Ports Available For Attendees
  • Fast Network: 40gbE Backbone

Outside food & drink are allowed. There is also free food delivery offered by Fast Track Indy.

Attendee Information

Being a LAN party, attendees are expected to bring their own PC, monitor, and cables. A power strip is also recommended. If you will be playing on console, please bring your own console and TV/display.

Tables & chairs will be provided for all attendees, however you are welcome to bring your own chair if you would like something more comfortable.

Bringing dedicated servers is allowed - if you plan on doing so, get in touch with us and let us know in the discord or via email. 10gbE connections will be available.

Tournaments

Below are the tournaments and schedule. Note that the tournaments are PC only, but they are a small part of the event. Aside from the tournaments below, many other games will be played: Unreal Tournament, DOTA 2, Starcraft, Call Of Duty, Fortnite, you name it! Just mention a game and you will find others willing to play.

Counter-Strike: Global Offensive:
Winners receive free admission to reBOOT 2020 Mega Event

Rocket League:
Winners receive free admission to reBOOT 2020 Mega Event

Get In Touch

The majority of reBOOT LAN is open source and powered by open source projects (XCP-ng, PfSense, ISC-DHCP, etc)
